tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: Contribution to the OAS-AICMA program “Assistance to victims of antipersonnel mines in Colombia 2022-2023”
Contributo al programma OSA-AICMA “Assistenza ai sopravvissuti a incidenti di mine antiuomo in Colombia 2022-2023”
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The proposal aims at mitigating the impact of anti-personnel mines and other explosive devices on the Colombian territory, through actions seeking to support the physical and psychological rehabilitation, vocational training and the implementation of microprojects for the strengthening of livelihoods for landmine victims, their families and communities.

La proposta mira a mitigare l'impatto delle mine antiuomo e altri ordigni esplosivi sul territorio colombiano, attraverso azioni di supporto alla riabilitazione fisica e psicologica, formazione professionale e la realizzazione di microprogetti per il rafforzamento dei mezzi di sussistenza per i sopravvissuti a incidenti provocati da mine, le loro famiglie e comunità.
